NetBSD Documentation:

NetBSD Package system growth

  • Growth of the NetBSD Packages collection
  • NetBSD growth compared to FreeBSD and OpenBSD
The NetBSD Packages Collection celebrated its second birthday in October 1999, and it also passed the 1000 package mark during that month. At the beginning of the new millennium (2001 :-) we were rapidly approaching 2000 pkgs. We are all grateful to everyone who has helped make this possible.

If your web browser cannot display PNG images, you may want to view the JPEG version of this page.

Growth of the NetBSD Packages collection (top)

NetBSD growth compared to FreeBSD and OpenBSD (top)

Note: In the first version of this graphs, the OpenBSD graph was only estimated, as the RCS files of the OpenBSD repository were not publically available and inquiries to the OpenBSD project were not answered at the time the graphs were generated. In this version, the data for OpenBSD as well as NetBSD and FreeBSD were pulled out of the RCS files, as their repositories are fully available now (many thanks to those providing that service).
